Name: Lucy
About the game: Help Lucy to find her treasure in this colorfull platformer from the 16bit era! Find treasures, kill enemies and uncover secrets in this adventure. Contains many stages with stars to collect and secrets to discover. You can play on the keyboard or on a controller!
